column5: Hi everyone, I have the opportunity to spend the long weekend at a cottage on Lake Vernon   and am having trouble finding info on it.   Can anyone give me some clues/links/maps. Or just let me know what type of fish there are in the lake so I know what to bring. Thanks very much   Mark
There are Bass and Pike in Vernon. Caught a few Bass and Pike there a few weeks ago. I used Top water for the most part.
Jerk baits cover alot of water up there. Both pike and large numbers in the bass.  If you have a big enough boat,give the other two lakes a try aswell. Fairy and Penn.
Thanks for the info, guys.  Mark
